svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

name="ページ1" id="P3QVuwOykNo_1JbTpokq"> <mxGraphModel dx="1248" dy="777" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="hiMwTscz6pL6OpQScx-_-1" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="930" width="690" x="70" y="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="hiMwTscz6pL6OpQScx-_-2" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=20;fontStyle=1" value="ErrorLink<div><font style="font-size: 14px;"><span>~ サーバーから帰ってきたエラーのチェック~</span></font></div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="50" width="320" x="254" y="150" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="hiMwTscz6pL6OpQScx-_-3" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="800" width="650" x="89" y="230" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="hiMwTscz6pL6OpQScx-_-4" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=16;" value="main.tsx" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="60" x="89" y="200" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="hiMwTscz6pL6OpQScx-_-5" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=14;" value="<div style="line-height: 180%;"><div style="line-height: 180%;">import { createRoot } from "react-com/client";</div><div style="line-height: 180%;">import App from "./App.tsx"</div><div style="line-height: 180%;">import { ApolloClient, InMemoryCache } from "@apollo/client";</div><div style="line-height: 180%;">import { ApolloProvider } from "@apollo/client/react";<br></div>import { ErrorLink } from ""@apollo/client/link/error;<div><span style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0);"><b>import { CombinedGraphQLErrors, CombinedProtocolErrors } from "@apollo/client/errors";</b></span></div><div><br></div><div>const errorLink = new ErrorLink( ( { error } ) =&gt; {</div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	<b>if ( <span style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0);">CombinedGraphQLErrors.is( error )</span> ) {</b></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><b><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	<span style="color: rgb(0, 153, 0);">error.errors.map( ( graphQLError ) =&gt; {</span></span></b></span></div><div><b style="color: rgb(0, 153, 0);"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	console.log( </span></span></span><span style="white-space: pre;">graphQLError.message </span><span style="white-space: pre;">);</span></b></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre; color: rgb(0, 153, 0);"><b><span style="white-space: pre;">	<span style="white-space: pre;">	</span></span>} );</b></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><b><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>} else if ( <span style="color: light-dark(rgb(255, 38, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237));">CombinedProtocolErrors.is( error )</span> ) {</b></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><b><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	<span style="color: rgb(0, 153, 0);">error.errors.map( ( protoclError ) =&gt; {</span></span></b></span></div><div><b style="color: rgb(0, 153, 0);"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	console.log(&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="white-space: pre;">protoclError.message </span><span style="white-space: pre;">);</span></b></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><b><span style="white-space: pre; color: rgb(0, 153, 0);"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>} );</span><br></b></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><b><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>} else {</b></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><b><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	console.log( error );</span><br></b></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><b><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</b></span><br></div><div>});</div><div><br></div><div>const client = new ApolloClient({</div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	link: errorLink,</span><br></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	cache: new InMomeryCache()</span><br></span></div><div>});</div><div><br></div><div>craeteRoot(document.getElementById('root')).render(</div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	&lt;ApolloProvider client={client} &gt;</span><br></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	&lt;App /&gt;</span><br></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	&lt;/ApolloProvider&gt;</span><span style="white-space: pre;"><br></span></div><div>);</div><div></div></div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="780" width="630" x="99" y="240" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="hiMwTscz6pL6OpQScx-_-6" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=14;fontStyle=1;fontColor=#FF0000;" value="エラークラスのインポート" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="20" width="180" x="520" y="310" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="hiMwTscz6pL6OpQScx-_-8" edge="1" parent="1" source="hiMwTscz6pL6OpQScx-_-5" rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 318px; height: 1px; padding-top: 45px; margin-left: 185px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
ErrorLink
~ サーバーから帰ってきたエラーのチェック~

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.div: エラークラスのインポート

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 278px; height: 1px; padding-top: 515px; margin-left: 401px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #FF0000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#FF0000, #ff9090); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
エラークラス.is(チェック対象オブジェクト)
でチェック対象の
オブジェクトのエラーの種類を判定する

switch.text: エラークラス.is(チェック対象オブジェクト)...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 298px; height: 1px; padding-top: 635px; margin-left: 370px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #009900;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#009900, #32b532); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
CombinedGraphQLErrorsとCombinedProtocolErrorsインスタンス
はerrorsプロパティ(配列)を持ち
個別のエラーがその要素として格納される
*GraphQLでは1回のリクエストで複数のエラーが返ってくることが珍しくない

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
